titles.title: Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the employer wage credit for activated military reservists.
Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2019 the tax credit for differential wage payments made by a small business employer on behalf of employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.
